Thank you! WORKS! Just be careful while following instructions! :)

People! ITS simple!

1 - installation
2 - It asking for key = Use keygen
3 - select Manual activation
4 - now its asking for response = IN KEYGEN PROGRAM in "challange" window type in numbers that are given you by Fist draft programm under "challange category" (I dont remember correct name it might be another one but idea is same)put them into "challange" window of keygen and it will automatically generate you response numbers copy them and past them into "response code" of Final Draft program!

Don't blame uploaded for your fail to pay careful attention!
Thank you soo much for this awesome and easy to install software!

Ok there is something very odd and very frustrating about this program.  I'm not sure if it's the program, the torrant or my computer.  Here's what's happening.  I install the program just fine and I activate it.  However when I try to use the program the pages are only 3 inches wide and hold only 24 lines.  Also everything is sort of crushed into the right side of the page.  The words go to the very edge of the page.  Can anyone tell me what the hell is going on?  I've used earlier versions of this program (not on this computer) and they have worked fine.

I install the program just fine and I activate it.  However when I try to use the program the pages are only 3 inches wide and hold only 24 lines.  Also everything is sort of crushed into the right side of the page.  The words go to the very edge of the page.  Can anyone tell me what the hell is going on?  I've used earlier versions of this program (not on this computer) and they have worked fine.

I install the program just fine and I activate it.  However when I try to use the program the pages are only 3 inches wide and hold only 24 lines.  Also everything is sort of crushed into the right side of the page.  The words go to the very edge of the page.  Can anyone tell me what the hell is going on?

Figured it out.  I had a HP photo Printer set as the default printer which made Final Draft think that the pages were only 5x7.  Sorry for any confusion.  If I knew how to delete my comments I would.  Works torrent works great!

The torrent works guys.

I'm a complete noob at this. This is my first time downloading anything from here, so please excuse my retardation. I downloaded it. Started it. It asks for my customer  number. I looked thru all the files I downloaded, couldn't find it. I found out I have to use a keygen. I looked thru the files I downloaded, couldn't find keygen. Then I find out I have to download the mac version and use THAT keygen. So I do that. I open the keygen and I see it wants a challenge code. From here I find out two different things. Someone says just to enter "challengecode" as the challenge code. I do that, hit calculate, and get a response code. Great, but I still don't have a Customer Code. The other thing I find out is that I have to get to "manual activation" in FD8. I could not figure out how to do that. My only options on FD8 are to enter customer code or enter demo mode. I enter demo mode and look everywhere, but I don't find any way to get into Manual Activation. So now I'm stuck, and it's not for lack of trying.
Will someone please help this idiot?
Thank you.
Thanks aoloffline for a great upload :)
